data.description: Ruby's String class ported to Perl
data.similar: String::Rexx maybe. Of course, this is Ruby and not REXX. :-)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module ports the whole String class provided by Ruby to Perl.
    It was originally intended to run on perls with the autobox patch
    (so that primitive types behave like objects), but now also has a
    purely functional interface with identical functionality.
